insert into column_detail (column_name_cn, column_name_en, `table_name`, parent_column_en, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, column_type, is_delete, column_example, remark ) values (#{columnNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{columnNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentColumnEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{columnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{columnExample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update column_detail set column_name_cn = #{columnNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, column_name_en = #{columnNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `table_name` = #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_column_en = #{parentColumnEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, column_type = #{columnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, column_example = #{columnExample,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, column_name_cn, column_name_en, `table_name`, parent_column_en, create_by, create_at, update_by, update_at, column_type, is_delete, column_example, remark from column_detail where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
